input:
Context: 
Utterance: 'HI, my heater hasn't arrived yet and we are in need of extra firewood. Plus, we're camping where there is 6 months of darkness, in Sweden. 😮'

Context: 'I might be able to get by with just two... I'm on a diet though, so I don't need as much food.' 'That's a relief. I actually have a friend joining me and they don't have their own food supply. I don't have enough for two people.' 'You can all the food if you need it.🙂'
Utterance: 'Thanks!🙂 Do you need any water packages?'

Context: 'It's good, thank you 🙂 Which package is the most important for you to have on your trip do you think?' 'That would be firewood. Even though is really hot there, it gets cold at night. How's the weather for you? 🙂' 'Ah yes, you'll definitely need some extra wood then! It's also pretty cold here, especially during the night. But I would definitely be willing to let you take 2 firewood in exchange for 3 food. We have a lot of people going and will be out in the middle of nowhere.'
Utterance: 'We can definitely work something out. I'll be sure it'll benefit you more than me. 🙂'
